name: Location based match 3
description:
A fast-passed, spooky Halloween themed match 3 game which involves the player to walk in order to unlock the levels. Levels contain Halloween themed pieces like bloody axes, graves, spooky pumpkins, witch cauldrons, etc. and the game involves the player to finish a level within limited times or moves.

Only the first 3 levels are playable as its just a prototype.

Coding:- (Mister thaft ctreates)https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZczqDvepgNqy80gTMGnUXw

UI assets:- https://opengameart.org/content/free-game-gui

Piece assets(pumpkins, witch hats, axes, etc.): - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/hand-painted-icons-102396#rev...

Tip:- As its a prototype you might encounter some of the bugs. If there is a match of 3 and the level doesn't detect the match, swipe on either of the pieces which are to be match and they will be matched.

Pro Tip:- Please walk and unlock the first 3 levels  before choosing to play any of those levels. Your progress for the steps taken will be lost as soon as you click on either of the levels to play them.
